name: fresh_potential_gems
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool crypto_gem_finder.
Tool description: Find your next gem crypto! Browse popular today, trending and recently added coins
API description: Fetches a list of recently added cryptocurrency coins from the Crypto Gem Finder API.

limit.description: The maximum number of recently added coins to fetch. Defaults to '10'.

page.description: The page number to fetch results from. Defaults to '1'.
